Key Match Events: Framber Valdez pitched seven no-hit innings.
Jose Altuve hit a game-ending RBI double in the ninth inning.
Jake Meyers singled off James McArthur with one out in the ninth inning.
Paul DeJong hit a game-tying home run in the ninth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada praised Jose Altuve's performance.
Framber Valdez agreed with the decision to be pulled from the game.
Manager Joe Espada praised Valdez's pitching performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Framber Valdez had previously thrown a no-hitter against Cleveland on August 1, 2023.
It was the second time this week the Astros took a no-hit bid into the eighth inning.
Others: Royals' 1B Vinnie Pasquantino will miss the rest of the regular season due to a broken thumb.
Astros' 3B Alex Bregman was out of the lineup with elbow soreness.
Astros' RF Kyle Tucker took live batting practice for the first time since June 3.
